diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +75,79 @@    'validate_certs': dict(removed_in_version=2.3, type='bool'),
    'timeout': dict(removed_in_version=2.3, type='int'),
    'transport': dict(choices=['cli']),
}
ce_argument_spec.update(ce_top_spec)

comments.body:
`default=cli` is not required for `ce` as it is not used in module code directly (eg: module.params['transport']). The drawback of adding a default at the top level is that for every `ce_*` module run it will display deprecation warning for transport irrespective of transport arg is present in playbook or not.

In case of `nxos` the module code directly references top level transport param (module.params['transport']) that' why it is added as default in top level arg. I will make necessary changes in nxos code to refer transport from provider param (for which it defaults to cli) in a separate PR

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +75,79 @@    'validate_certs': dict(removed_in_version=2.9, type='bool'),
    'timeout': dict(removed_in_version=2.9, type='int'),
    'transport': dict(removed_in_version=2.9, choices=['cli']),
}
ce_argument_spec.update(ce_top_spec)
